product_meta.title: Huawei P20 Pro 128 GB 6.1-Inch FHD+ FullView Android 8.1 SIM-Free Smartphone, Single SIM, Black - UK Version
product_meta.description: Size Name:HUAWEI P20 ProThe Huawei P20 Pro isn’t one of those underwhelming phones that get churned out annually with a negligible upgrade - this device is something special. Looks elegant and packed with features, this flagship smartphone has been created with an OLED screen, a bezel-less design and a glass back, while the octa-core processor and 6 GB of RAM mean that it’s fast. Then there are the fantastic front 24 MP and rear 40 MP cameras that not only shames competitors due to picture quality and speed, they positively destroy their innovative reputations too. Radical photos, the P20 Pro comes equipped with AI (Artificial Intelligence) image stabilisation, Leica optics lenses and a laser sensor for instant focus with motion prediction. There’s a 24 MP front camera, so you can take selfies, while the rear camera contains 3 lenses: A 20 MP monochrome, a 40 MP RGB as well as a 8 MP telephoto lens. Along with all the hardware power, you have Huawei’s clever AI which will ensure you take vibrant photographs, no matter if you’re in very lowlight conditions, all the while safeguarding that no one is missing from your group shots.

Lowlight photography master with Leica Triple AI Camera (40MP + 24MP + 8 MP) and 24 MP Front AI Camera, able to identify in real-time 19 different categories
Perfect for flattering selfies with the 3D Portrait Lighting, and capturing living moments with 960 fps Super Slow Motion and 5X Hybrid Zoom
4000mAh large battery with Huawei SuperCharge, to unlock your phone with IR facial recognition and fingerprint sensor
"NFC supported and revolutionary image processing acceleration powered by GPU Turbo Technology for smooth and flowing gaming experience."
